rgya gar skad la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i skad sor bzhag rnams ni sngon gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po rnams kyi mdzad pa bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po dang / sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa
la sogs pa la brten nas dag par byas shing / bod skad rnams ni yul skad dang / 'phral skad ngan pa rnams dang ma 'dres par bod yul gyi sngon gyi brda mas mkhan po rnams
dang / sgyur byed dam pa snga phyir byon pa rnams kyi brda gsar rnying / skad gsar bcad la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas ma mya da drag sa stsogs la sogs pa yod
med rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar mdzad pa ltar gsung rab kyi dpi byi rnams la snga zhus gsung rab gsum gsum dang gtugs te brda don ma nor bar dag
par bgyis nas gzhi dung gi sa bzhi ltar dkar zhing 'jam la mkhregs pa'i lho rgyal po lha khang gi sho gu la/ dam che zhing mdangs gsal ba ud pa la
sngon po lta bu rgya nag chen po las 'ongs pa'i snag tshas/ /'bur dkyus tshugs gsum la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin pas yi ge'i rig byed la slob dpon kyi go 'phang thob pas
dag snyoms mdzes par bzhengs pa/ dbus gtsang gi yi ge pa yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa rnams kyis legs par bris pa la phyi zhus lan gsum du bgyis te bzhengs pa rnams las khyad par du

thugs dam mdo mangs skye dgu'i blo gros mun sel phan bde'i gter chen zhes bya ba 'di bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che'i thugs dam lha mi'i rgyan mchog ma zhes bya ba dang / pho brang chen po gtsang

chu mig ring mo'i gtsug lag khang gi mdo mangs rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa dge ba'i shes gnyen 'dar phyar kyis bzhengs pa'i mdo mangs 'dar phyar ma zhes grags pa dang / 'brang mtshams phug chud
ma zhes grags pa dang / dga' 'bar ma zhes grags pa dang / dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang gi mdo mangs rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa mkhan po chen po mchims kyi thugs dam mdo mangs gser
gzhung ma dang / phyug rgyal ma dang / dgon gsar ma la sogs pa rnams dang / gzhan yang bla ma gru spang rtsa ba'i thugs dam mdo mangs 'dzam gling rgyan dang / shog chung gi gtsug
lag khang gi mdo mangs drug bcu rtsa gnyis dum dang / spun gsum gyi gtsug lag khang gi mdo mangs dang / zha lu gser khang gi gtsug lag gi mdo mangs gzhi ma dang / smon dar zhes grags

pa la sogs pa mdo sna mang zhing go rims legs pa rnams la dpe phyi byas nas snar thang du bzhengs pa rnams phyi mor gdan drangs te/ mdo dngos ma yin pa rgyud sder gtogs pa'i gzungs rnams ni rgyud 'bum gyi nang du bris

shing / gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa dang / kun la'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang / dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa dang / li lung bstan pa la sogs pa rnams ni bde bar gshegs
pa mya ngan las 'das nas phyis 'phags pa rnams kyis mdzad pa yin zhing / gdags pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyang mdo sde pa la sogs pa grub mtha' smra ba kha cig bkar mi 'dod la/ skyes rabs dang /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa rnams dang / gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa la sogs pa rnams ni phyis slob dpon dpa' bo la sogs pa

bstan bcos mkhan po rnams kyis mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir dang / thub pa drang srong garga'i ltas kyi rnam pa bstan pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig phyi rol pa'i rig byed kyi gzhung gi cha shas su snang bas bstan bcos 'gyur

ro cog gi nang du bris pas 'dir ni theg pa che chung gi mdor nges pa rnams theg pa dang brjod bya 'thun pa dang / mtshan 'thun pa dang / sde tshan 'thun pa rnams so sor bsdebs te grangs dang go rims tshang la ma nor bar rgyu bzang zhing bkod

pa legs par bzhengs pa yin no/ /de ltar bsod nams dpal gyis rab mtho ba/ /dpal ldan bla ma dge sbyong chen po de'i/ /thugs kyi dgongs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal gyi snar thang nas/ /
bka' 'gyur dri med phyi mor gdan drangs te/ /chos kyi rgyal po dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sdes/ /phan dang bde ba'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba yi/ /bstan pa spel phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung / /gangs ri'i
khrod 'dir ji snyed 'gyur ro cog /legs par bzhengs par gyur pa de dag las/ /'di ni skye dgu'i blo gros mun sel zhing / /phan bde'i gter chen zhes bya'i mdo sde'o/ /de ltar dpal ldan lhag
bsam dag pa'i mthus/ /gsung rab rin chen tshul bzhin bzhengs pa las/ /byung ba'i dge ba ston ka'i zla 'od dang / /mkha' ltar dag cing yangs pa gang thob des/ /'gro kun phan
bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba yi/ /bstan pa rin chen phyogs dus kun khyab cing / /sde 'dzin skyong dang srung ba'i dam pa rnams/ /skye dgu'i dpal du yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /gang gis
gsung rab dri med 'di bzhengs pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde/ /bstan dang 'gro ba'i rtsa lag dam par ni/ /sa chen steng 'dir yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /
khyad par du yang des pas sa skyong ba'i/ /mi dbang yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /snyun med sku tshe ring zhing chab srid brtan/ /byams brtse'i thugs kyis skye
dgu skyong gyur cig /srid 'bangs rnams kyang phan tshun byams ldan zhing / /nad dang mu ge 'thab rtsod la sogs pa/ /phyi nang nyer 'tshe'i gnod pa kun zhi nas/ /
tshe ring 'byor ldan bstan la dad gyur cig /gang dag 'di la sgo gsum gus pa yis/ /bya ba byed dang rjes su yi rang dang / /rgyu rkyen 'bul dang chos spyod rnam bcu
yis/ /tshul bzhin sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang / /'dir yang tshe ring nad med 'byor ldan zhing / /skye zhing skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du'ang / /'khor lo
bzhi dang yon tan rnam bdun dang / /rnam smin brgyad ldan dal 'byor lus thob nas/ /mthong dang bsgom pas spong bya'i nyon mongs dang / /shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags
bcas pa kun/ /spong byed gnyen po lam lnga sa bcu rnams/ /rim gyis bgrod nas kun mkhyen thob par shog /gang la brten nas nyes tshogs rnam spong zhing / /gnas skabs
mthar thug dge legs kun 'byung ba/ /spobs pa bzhi ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung / /mdo sde dkon mchog rnams kyi bkra shis shog /zhus te/ dag go/ /
yang zhus she/ dus phyis mdo mangs kyi po ti rang ga rnams kyi gzhung lugs dang 'thun pa'i 'chos dgos rnams legs par gtan la phab nas dag par bzhugs pa skar mas bgyis so/ /bkra shis par gyur cig/ //

ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he dun te ShA~M ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// //mdo mangs pu ti sum bcu rtsa gnyis la/ mdo grangs nyis brgya brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi bzhugs// //
